overview:
Wahyudi is the founder and CEO of Yotomo. A startup company based in Singapore and Indonesia, localizing core features of Foursquare.

Wahyudi has more than 10 years of software development. He is originally from Jakarta, Indonesia. He spent 10 years in Germany to visit college and works at some IT companies, before moved to New Jersey and New York to work as software developer.

He went back to Indonesia in 2010 and founded Yotomo, a mobile application, which at the beginning focused on localizing Foursquare, as this service is very popular in Indonesia. Currently Yotomo offers local badges from local brands, communities, traditions. Also offering business owners tools to keep track of their visitors while offering their clients points rewards mechanism.
